chunk:
Dr. Barbara Sturm Molecular Cosmetics Hyaluronic Serum (2019 formulation)

Brand: Dr. Barbara Sturm

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water (aqua), butylene glycol, lactobacillus/portulaca oleracea ferment extract, phenoxyethanol, sodium hyaluronate, ethylhexylglycerin, potassium sorbate, leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate.

Directio

filtrate.

Directions: Squeeze one full pipette into the palm of your hand and apply it evenly to your face before patting it in gently. After 30 seconds, when the serum has been absorbed, apply the FACE CREAM. The serum is suitable for all skin types.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Devel
; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
